improved cookstoves.Description: Improved cookstoves help address the issue of clean cooking by reducing indoor air pollution and improving the health of households.
Improved cookstoves help reduce household air pollution by burning fuel more efficiently and reducing the emission of harmful pollutants.
Improved cookstoves increase fuel efficiency by burning less fuel and producing more heat, resulting in reduced fuel consumption and cost savings.
Improved cookstoves decrease carbon emissions by burning fuel more efficiently, resulting in lower greenhouse gas emissions and mitigating climate change.
